Class Playlist

java.lang.Object
Playlist
public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object
Playlist class stores and modifies song objects in an Arraylist
Author:
CS2334, Dylan Bui

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Playlist()
    Default constructor, all fields are specified.
    Playlist​(java.lang.String filename)
    Constructor method create a playlist filled with songs from a file

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addSong​(int index, Song song)
    Method used to add a specified song at a specified index of the Arraylist
    boolean addSong​(Song song)
    Method used to add an individual song to the end of the Arraylist
    void addSongs​(java.lang.String filename)
    Method used to add songs from a file to an Arraylist of songs
    int addSongs​(Playlist playlist)
    Method used to add a Playlist of songs to another playlist
    int getNumSongs()
    Accessor method for the Arraylist of songs
    Song getSong​(int index)
    Accessor method for the Arraylist of songs
    Song[] getSongs()
    Accessor method for the Arraylist of songs
    int[] getTotalTime()
    Method used to receive the total amount of time of the songs in a playlist
    Song removeSong()
    Method used to remove the last song of a playlist
    Song removeSong​(int index)
    Method used to remove a specified song at a specified index of the Arraylist
    void saveSongs​(java.lang.String filename)
    Method used to save or overwrite the current songs in the Arraylist to a specified filename
    java.lang.String toString()
    Method used to return all songs in string format

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Playlist

      public Playlist()
      Default constructor, all fields are specified.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found

    • Playlist

      public Playlist​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor method create a playlist filled with songs from a file
      Parameters:
      filename - that contains the songs to be added
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • getNumSongs

      public int getNumSongs()
      Accessor method for the Arraylist of songs
      Returns:
      Amount of songs stored in the Array list in the form of an integer

    • getSong

      public Song getSong​(int index)
      Accessor method for the Arraylist of songs
      Parameters:
      index - Integer used to specify the index of the song that will be returned
      Returns:
      Song at specified index

    • getSongs

      public Song[] getSongs()
      Accessor method for the Arraylist of songs
      Returns:
      returns entire array of songs

    • addSong

      public boolean addSong​(Song song)
      Method used to add an individual song to the end of the Arraylist
      Parameters:
      Song - that will be added to the Arraylist of songs
      Returns:
      returns true if song was successfully added to the Arraylist and false otherwise

    • addSong

      public boolean addSong​(int index, Song song)
      Method used to add a specified song at a specified index of the Arraylist
      Parameters:
      index - Integer used to specify the index of the song that will be added
      Song - that will be added to the Arraylist of songs
      Returns:
      returns true if song was successfully added to the Arraylist and false otherwise

    • addSongs

      public int addSongs​(Playlist playlist)
      Method used to add a Playlist of songs to another playlist
      Parameters:
      Playlist - that contains songs to be added
      Returns:
      returns the amount of songs that was added in the form of an integer

    • removeSong

      public Song removeSong()
      Method used to remove the last song of a playlist

    • removeSong

      public Song removeSong​(int index)
      Method used to remove a specified song at a specified index of the Arraylist
      Parameters:
      index - Integer used to specify the index of the song that will be removed
      Returns:
      returns the song that removed. returns null if song was not removed

    • addSongs

      public void addSongs​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Method used to add songs from a file to an Arraylist of songs
      Parameters:
      filename - that contains the songs to be added
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Method used to return all songs in string format
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String of all the songs in the playlist in the format{title; artist;time}

    • saveSongs

      public void saveSongs​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Method used to save or overwrite the current songs in the Arraylist to a specified filename
      Parameters:
      filename - used to specify the location where the songs will be saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getTotalTime

      public int[] getTotalTime()
      Method used to receive the total amount of time of the songs in a playlist
      Returns:
      an Integer array of the total time in the format{seconds,minutes,hours}
